rules.name: Yes
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 3 AND ((2 AND 4 AND 5) OR 6) AND 7

Flow.description: GTMS-17662: created this flow to map webstore opportunity data to docusign record GTMS-17606: Created this flow to close the small fleet webstore opportunity (mved this logic from webstore) GTMS-17930: Added Small Fleet checkbox condition in closing if condition element on 1/10/24 1/4/24: Added new field mapping of docusign record in Docusign_Fields_Update_for_OVA_in_Asn element as part of DCA project for GTMS-16637 GTMS-19277: Updated Billing email mapping on docusign with Consolidated Billing Email field on Quote. - 3/7/24 GTMS-18053: updated docusign field mapping if opportunity dont have a primary quote 3/27/24 GTMS-19977: Added one more 15 mins delay path and Adding Webstore email to Opportunity Owners GTMS-19977: changed from email action to email alert GTMS-20305: added 3 mins delay path for quote recalculation

formulas.description: 1/4/24: Created as part of DCA Project to store bill to contact name for GTMS-16637
formulas.name: Bill_To_Contact_Name

formulas.description: GTMS-16637: Created as part of DCA Project
formulas.name: BIllingEmail
OVA_Field_Details
formulas.expression: {!$Record.OVA_Docusign_Field_Tracking__c}+';<--->;'+'Custom Schedule: '+IF({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Custom_Schedule__c},'TRUE','FALSE')+';'+'Type: '+TEXT({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Type})+';'+'Owner Role Copy: '+{!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c}+';'+'Owner Manager Role Copy: '+{!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Owner_Manager_Role_Copy__c}+';'+'Finance Segment: '+{!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Finance_Segment__c}+';'+'Is Webstore: '+IF({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Is_Webstore_Upsell_Opportunity__c},'TRUE','FALSE')+';'+'Payment Type: '+{!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Payment_Type__c}+';'+'Owner Segment: '+{!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Owner_Segment__c}+';'+'Is Renewal'+IF({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.SBQQ__Renewal__c},'TRUE','FALSE')+'Name: '+{!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Name}

formulas.description: to check if triggered records satisfies entry cirteria
formulas.name: OVAEntryCriteria
formulas.expression: AND( NOT( {!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Custom_Schedule__c} = true || NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Type}, 'Revenue Opportunity')) || CONTAINS({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Owner_Role_Copy__c}, 'SLED') || CONTAINS({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Owner_Manager_Role_Copy__c}, 'SLED') || (({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Finance_Segment__c} = 'Enterprise' && {!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Is_Webstore_Upsell_Opportunity__c} = false)) || {!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Payment_Type__c} = 'Reseller' || {!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Owner_Segment__c} = 'AE1' || {!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Payment_Type__c} = 'Finance Partner' || {!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.SBQQ__Renewal__c} = true || CONTAINS({!$Record.dsfs__Opportunity__r.Name},'INVENTORYSPLIT') ) )

formulas.description: To combine Opportunity Owner First name and Last Name
